players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I'm Charlie, the mafioso. Stay cautious, Diana."
You: "I'm Alice, investigating Bob. Charlie as mafioso makes him a suspect."
Diana: "Charlie confirmed mafioso. Alice, watch him closely."
You: "Will watch Charlie closely. Any info on Bob's death?"
Diana: "Investigated Bob, no foul play. Keep an eye on Charlie."
Charlie: "Observing Alice & Diana. Stay alert."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
